Page._content:
# Theme NexT Canvas Nest

![Theme Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/NexT-v7.3.0+-blue?style=flat-square)

[canvas-nest.js](https://github.com/hustcc/canvas-nest.js) for [NexT](https://github.com/theme-next).

## Install

### Step 1 → Go to Hexo dir

Change dir to **Hexo** directory. There must be `scaffolds`, `source`, `themes` and other directories:

```sh
$ cd hexo
$ ls
scaffolds  source  themes  _config.yml  package.json
```

### Step 2 → Create `footer.swig`

Create a file named `footer.swig` in `hexo/source/_data` directory (create `_data` directory if it does not exist).

Edit this file and add the following content:

```xml
<script color="0,0,255" opacity="0.5" zIndex="-1" count="99" src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/canvas-nest.js@1/dist/canvas-nest.js"></script>
```

You can customize these options.

### Step 3 → Set it up

In the NexT `_config.yml`, uncomment `footer` under the `custom_file_path` section.

```yml
# Define custom file paths.
# Create your custom files in site directory `source/_data` and uncomment needed files below.
custom_file_path:
  #head: source/_data/head.swig
  #header: source/_data/header.swig
  #sidebar: source/_data/sidebar.swig
  #postMeta: source/_data/post-meta.swig
  #postBodyEnd: source/_data/post-body-end.swig
  footer: source/_data/footer.swig
  #bodyEnd: source/_data/body-end.swig
  #variable: source/_data/variables.styl
  #mixin: source/_data/mixins.styl
  #style: source/_data/styles.styl
```
Page.raw:
# Theme NexT Canvas Nest

![Theme Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/NexT-v7.3.0+-blue?style=flat-square)

[canvas-nest.js](https://github.com/hustcc/canvas-nest.js) for [NexT](https://github.com/theme-next).

## Install

### Step 1 → Go to Hexo dir

Change dir to **Hexo** directory. There must be `scaffolds`, `source`, `themes` and other directories:

```sh
$ cd hexo
$ ls
scaffolds  source  themes  _config.yml  package.json
```

### Step 2 → Create `footer.swig`

Create a file named `footer.swig` in `hexo/source/_data` directory (create `_data` directory if it does not exist).

Edit this file and add the following content:

```xml
<script color="0,0,255" opacity="0.5" zIndex="-1" count="99" src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/canvas-nest.js@1/dist/canvas-nest.js"></script>
```

You can customize these options.

### Step 3 → Set it up

In the NexT `_config.yml`, uncomment `footer` under the `custom_file_path` section.

```yml
# Define custom file paths.
# Create your custom files in site directory `source/_data` and uncomment needed files below.
custom_file_path:
  #head: source/_data/head.swig
  #header: source/_data/header.swig
  #sidebar: source/_data/sidebar.swig
  #postMeta: source/_data/post-meta.swig
  #postBodyEnd: source/_data/post-body-end.swig
  footer: source/_data/footer.swig
  #bodyEnd: source/_data/body-end.swig
  #variable: source/_data/variables.styl
  #mixin: source/_data/mixins.styl
  #style: source/_data/styles.styl
```

You can customize these options.

Step 3 → Set it up

In the NexT _config.yml, uncomment footer under the custom_file_path section.

Change dir to Hexo directory. There must be scaffolds, source, themes and other directories:

Step 2 → Create footer.swig

Create a file named footer.swig in hexo/source/_data directory (create _data directory if it does not exist).

Edit this file and add the following content:

You can customize these options.

Step 3 → Set it up

In the NexT _config.yml, uncomment footer under the custom_file_path section.

Post.title: ES6. Scope
Post._content:
### 1. 

 `JS` 
<!-- more -->
```javascript
var a =12;
```



```javascript
b = 1234;
```
 `a` `b`  `window` `delete``delete`

```javascript
delete a; // false
delete b;// true
 var  window 
function fn(){
    ab = 100;
}
fn()
```
### 2. 

```javascript
function test(){
    var a = 4;
    return a+1
}
console.log(test());// 5
console.log(a);// a is not defined 
```


1.  return 
2. 
### 3. 
```javascript
function test(){
    var a = 4;
    if (a===4){
        let b = 5
    }
    console.log(b)// error
    return a+1
}
test()
```
### 4. 
```javascript
this 
window.a = 3
function test(){
    console.log(this.a)
}
//  this 
test() // 3
test.bind( {a : 100 } )( ) // 100
```


### 5.let
let 

1. let 

2. let  window 

3. let 

4. let 

  ```javascript
  {
   let a = 4
   console.log(a) // 4
  }
  console.log(a) //error
  var b = 5
  let c = 6
  console.log(window.a, window.b) // 5, undefined
  ```

  

### 6.const

const 

1. const 

2. const 

   ```javascript
   const a 
   a = 1 
   ```

    `a`   `a` `//error`

### 7.
7.1 
 i 

```javascript
for (var i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
 setTimeout(function () {
     console.log(i);
 },1000)
 console.log(i);
}
```

0 1 2 3 3 3


1. 

2. var 



 `setTimeout()`  0  

 `i`  `var  i = 3;`
 `var`  `let`  `i `
7.2 


```javascript
console.log(a); 
let a=1
```

 `Cannot access 'a' before initialization`
